0.title: The Family That Squatches Together
0.plot: With the help of family and friends, the team is investigating sightings along the Appalachian Trail. With a possible squatch in their midst, the group descends on a location along the trail, hoping for a squatchy night in the wilds of the Appalachia.

1.title: Disco Bigfoot
1.plot: Compelling evidence brings the team back to the most surprisingly squatchy state, New Jersey. After a night investigation and town hall meeting, Cliff breaks from the team to squatch with his friend, comedian Bobcat Goldthwait.

4.title: Bright lights and bigfoots
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Bigfoot Crossing in Georgia
1.plot: Find out what the team thinks about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in Georgia.

2.title: Swamp Ape
2.plot: What the team thinks about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in Florida.

3.title: Caught on Tape
3.plot: Find out what the team thinks about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in North Carolina.

4.title: Fishing for Bigfoot in Oregon
4.plot: Find out what the investigators think about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in Oregon.

5.title: Frozen Bigfoot
5.plot: Find out what the team thinks about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in Washington State.

6.title: Alaska's Bigfoot Island
6.plot: Find out what the team thinks about their expedition to find evidence of sasquatches in Alaska.

7.title: Behind the Search
7.plot: Matt Moneymaker and his team of Bigfoot researchers return to Oregon to participate in their favorite event, Bigfoot and Beer. The team reflect on their expeditions, answer questions and share some never before seen moments.

0.title: Birth of a Legend: Halloween Special
0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Birth of a Legend
1.plot: The Finding Bigfoot team travel to Humbolt County, California. There they are guided by Bob Gimlin, to the site of the 1967 Patterson--Gimlin film. The team also visits with some of the locals and does some investigating on their own.

2.title: Baby Bigfoot
2.plot: The bigfoot research team heads to New York to investigate video of an alleged baby bigfoot. When locals report bigfoot activity in the neighboring woods, the teams tries a new search method in hopes of finding bigfoots near the Big Apple.

3.title: Big Rhodey
3.plot: The Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization go to Rhode Island to examine video of a roadside sighting of a bigfoot. They learn that this unexplored area has a wealth of sasquatch activity and hope to prove that this small state is hiding bigfoots.

4.title: Peeping Bigfoot
4.plot: The Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization head to Minnesota to investigate intriguing howls recorded at an infamous bigfoot hotspot. They go deep into the wild, hot on the trail of bigfoots rumored to be bigger and bolder than any other on earth.

5.title: Canadian Bigfoot, Eh?
5.plot: The Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization travel to Canada to investigate a unique bigfoot encounter caught on tape. The team zeroes in on the Canadian Rockies is search of what may be the most territorial sasquatches on earth.

6.title: Buckeye Bigfoot
6.plot: The team travels to Ohio to investigate an alleged close encounter with a bigfoot caught on tape. They assemble a group of volunteers to search a notorious forest for evidence, in hopes of proving bigfoots exist in Ohio.

7.title: Moonshine and Bigfoot
7.plot: The team travels to Kentucky to investigate a piece of footage that seems to show the glowing eyes of a bigfoot. With locals reporting activity in Daniel Boone National Forest, the team tries a new search technique to see there really are bigfoots in KY.

10.title: Hoosier Bigfoot
10.plot: The team travels to Indiana to investigate footage that purports to show a bigfoot in daylight. With sightings reported around Morgan-Monroe State Forest, the team lights up the sky in a new technique, to prove bigfoots do call the Hoosier state home.

11.title: Holy Cow, It's Bigfoot
11.plot: A mysterious video and reports from Utah State University help the team to determine that bigfoots have lived in the mountainous state for decades. Hoping to corner a squatch, they invite a witness to help in their final night investigation.

1.title: Untold Stories
1.plot: Prepare for a majestic, behind-the-scenes journey across the pond as the Finding Bigfoot team sets their sights on new squatchy locales in the UK to search for bigfoot.

2.title: Ripped from the Headlines
2.plot: The team travels to Idaho to investigate video evidence that has recently garnered national media attention. Trying a new, innovative baiting technique, Bobo devises an unusual plan that just might prove this mystery to be true.

3.title: Mother Bigfoot
3.plot: The Finding Bigfoot team travels to an apple orchard in Vermont to investigate a photo of what may be a sasquatch carrying her baby. With reports throughout the Adirondack Corridor, they take to the forest in hopes of finding evidence themselves.

4.title: CSI Bigfoot
4.plot: The crew travels to Oklahoma to investigate evidence that could be bigfoot DNA. Hanging on the results of this breakthrough, the team takes to the waterways of Oklahoma City, where many residents claim to have recently seen a bigfoot.

5.title: The Sierra Spy
5.plot: The bigfoot research team heads to Virginia to investigate video the locals are dubbing "The Beast of Gumhill." With new reports from the town hall meeting, the team uses a unique search technique to prove this elusive beast is real.

6.title: Dances with Bigfoot
6.plot: The team travels to Arizona's Mogollon Rim to investigate sightings of what locals have described as a bigfoot. To narrow down their search they enlist the aid of a local Apache Indian tribe.

7.title: Bigfoot and Wolverines
7.plot: The Finding Bigfoot team has traveled to Michigan to investigate a promising message left on the BFRO hotline. With a wealth of recent reports from this area, the team takes to the woods in what may be their most successful night investigation.

8.title: Bobo Marks His Turf
8.plot: The BFRO travels to the Jemez Mountain area of New Mexico to investigate a thermal image video of a possible bigfoot. With sightings in and around the vast Valles Caldera National Park, the team narrows down their search by using a hot air balloon.

9.title: Australian Yowie
9.plot: The team travels half way across the world to investigate recent reports of Australia's yowie, a creature similar to sasquatch in both appearance and behavior. They traverse deep into the jungle in hopes of proving bigfoot's cousin down under is real.

10.title: Squatch Spies
10.plot: The team travels to the country's most notorious hotspot for sasquatch activity to investigate howls recently recorded by the local BFRO. With the aid of high tech thermal equipment, the team sets off to prove bigfoots call Washington state home.

11.title: Bacon for Bigfoot
11.plot: The mayor of a small town in Louisiana calls upon the bigfoot team to investigate unusual activity in his community. To lure in these mysterious creatures, the team deploys a new baiting technique and discovers convincing evidence themselves.

12.title: Bigfoot Merit Badge
12.plot: The team travels to CO to investigate footage of a possible bigfoot, predating the famous Patterson-Gimlin film by five years. They narrow down their search grid and call upon the aid of a Girl Scout troop to help bait a bigfoot.

13.title: Bigfoot Hoedown
13.plot: The team travels to West Virginia to investigate photographs from a young Bigfooter that may depict a Sasquatch in his own backyard. In a state rich with Bigfoot history, the team sets out to get their own photographic proof, and deploys a baiting technique not for the faint of heart.

14.title: Badlands Bigfoot
14.plot: The team travels to South Dakota to meet with compelling witnesses from the Lakota Sioux, who claim Bigfoots roam the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation. After zeroing in on a hot spot, the team is granted special access to private land where they just might find the Lakota's legendary Tall Man.

15.title: Indonesia's Little Bigfoot
15.plot: The Finding Bigfoot team journeys to the island of Sumatra in search of Indonesia's elusive orang pendek, venutring into the unfamiliar jungle in hopes of proving this mythical creature is in fact real.

16.title: Squatchers Without Borders
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Peek-a-Boo Bigfoot
17.plot: The team travels to the Great Smokey Mountains of Tennessee to investigate trail camera photos that may show a Sasquatch living in these mountains. After several witnesses share stories of their own sightings, the team enlists the aid of professional hog callers to try and bait a hungry Bigfoot.

18.title: Bigfoot and the Redhead
18.plot: The team travels to Pennsylvania to meet with two teenagers who may have accidentally filmed a Bigfoot while riding their ATVs. A packed town hall leads them to the Allegheny National Forest, where they deploy a unique search technique to try and elicit a response from an east coast Bigfoot.

19.title: Bigfoot Loves a Barbecue
19.plot: The team travels to Connecticut to investigate video footage of a possible Bigfoot captured by a mother recording her children at play. In one of the most populated state per square mile, they meet with local eyewitnesses and set up a bait trap in hopes of luring in any hungry Bigfoots nearby.

20.title: Oregon: Virgin Bigfoot
20.plot: The team returns to Oregon to investigate a record amount of bigfoot tracks originally cast and documented by Cliff. As they zero in on a recent hotspot, the team deploys a dangerous technique to increase their odds of capturing this elusive creature.

21.title: Bigfoot the Friendly Ghost
21.plot: The team travels to Illinois to meet a man who claims to have recorded Bigfoot howls in his own backyard. After several witnesses share their sightings of these creatures in some unusual locations, the team sets up a musical bait trap in hopes of enticing a curious Sasquatch to come take a peek.

22.title: Vietnam: The Heart of Squatchness
22.plot: The team travels to Vietnam in search of the Wildman, a bi-pedal ape similar to Bigfoot in its ability to elude man. Although little is known about this creature, villagers help guide the team to a hot spot of activity, where they brave the dangerous jungle and stumble upon some unexpected surprises.

2.title: The Legend of Boggy Creek
2.plot: The team travels to Fouke, Arkansas, home of the 1972 Bigfoot documentary, "The Legend of Boggy Creek." With a long history of sightings near this small town, the team takes to the surrounding swamps in hopes of proving Arkansas' Bigfoot is more than just legend.

3.title: Surf's Up, Sasquatch
3.plot: The team travels to Santa Cruz to visit the Bigfoot Discovery Museum. The museum's owner directs them to recent eyewitnesses and secret hotspots. Bobo hopes the smells from an authentic Hawaiian luau will be too much for nearby bigfoots to resist.

4.title: Best Evidence Yet
4.plot: The team returns to Florida, to investigate thermal footage of a possible Bigfoot. Convinced of the evidence, they revisit witnesses from previous expeditions and narrow their search to a recent hot spot. Armed with high tech thermal imagers, they gather what may be their best evidence yet.

5.title: Kung Fu Bigfoot
5.plot: The team travels to China in search of the Yeren, a bi-pedal, hair-covered ape similar to Bigfoot in its ability to remain elusive. With help from the country's leading expert, they head into a wildlife refuge and use their Bigfooting skills in hopes of proving the Yeren is more than just legend.

6.title: Sketching Sasquatch
6.plot: The team from Finding Bigfoot travels to the California/Nevada border to investigate audio recordings of a possible Sasquatch obtained near Lake Tahoe. While blasting calls throughout multiple valleys in the Sierras, they discover some of their best evidence to date.

7.title: Lonestar Squatch
7.plot: The team travels to Eastern Texas to investigate thermal footage that may show a Bigfoot spying on a campsite. Convinced by the evidence, they enlist the aid of primate tracking dogs in hopes of proving Bigfoots do roam the Lonestar State.

8.title: Abominable Snowman
8.plot: The team from Finding Bigfoot travel around the world to Nepal in search of the infamous Yeti. They visit monasteries with Yeti relics, talk to firsthand witnesses and travel into the dense forests of the Himalayas. Will they succeed in finding evidence?

9.title: Big Sky Bigfoot
9.plot: The team travels to big sky country, to investigate recent Sasquatch activity near the city of Bozeman, Montana. After meeting a variety of witnesses, they enlist the aid of a dog sled team to take them deep into a nearby valley, where they set up a fake deer trap in hopes of luring in a hungry Bigfoot.

10.title: Bigfoot of Oz
10.plot: The team travels to America's heartland to determine if Bigfoots really live on the great plains of Kansas. With help from eyewitnesses, they narrow their search to waterways outside of Wichita, where they take to the sky and employ a unique baiting technique to try and lure in a mid-west Bigfoot.

11.title: Super Yooper Sasquatch
11.plot: The team travels to the Upper Peninsula of Michigan to investigate a photo of a sasquatch. With witnesses in this region claiming bigfoots have been stalking them, the team deploys a U.P. delicacy in hopes a sasquatch has the same appetite as the locals.

12.title: South Jersey Sasquatch
12.plot: The team visits the Garden State for the first time. After their successful night investigation, they hold a town hall meeting to gather more witnesses. The team investigates a refuge that used to be a cranberry bog trying to prove bigfoots live in NJ.

13.title: Coal Miner's Bigfoot
13.plot: The team travels back to West Virginia to investigate recent recordings of possible bigfoot howls. With the help of a radio show, the team reaches out to witnesses from across the state and rafts deep into the holler in hopes of finding a bigfoot.

14.title: 1, 2, 3, 4, I Declare a Squatch War
14.plot: The team travels back to the Pacific Northwest to determine the squatchiest state in the U.S. With the team evenly divided and a friendly wager made, Bobo and Cliff head to Oregon while Matt and Ranae head to Washington to see which state is squatchier.

1.title: Bigfoot Call of the Wild Man
1.plot: The investigators travel once more to the state of Kentucky to inspect some recent casts of bigfoot tracks. After a wild night with Ernie the Turtleman, they have a terrifying night of their own using Louisville Sluggers for knockers.

2.title: Squatters for Sasquatch
2.plot: The team travels to Virginia to investigate a trail camera photo of a possible juvenile sasquatch. Arriving on the dawn of hunting season, the team hunkers down, all in the hopes that Stumpy, their bigfoot decoy, will lure in a lonely squatch.

3.title: Beast of the Bayou
3.plot: The team is back to Louisiana to investigate a trail camera photo of a possible sasquatch. Confident they use the bayous to stay hidden, they head to a national forest, and with the help of a local drum line, they hope to lure a beast of the bayou.

4.title: Squatching in a Winter Wonderland
4.plot: Finding Bigfoot travels to Eastern Washington and the Blue Mountains to meet with anatomy expert professor Jeff Meldrum. With accounts going back for half a century the team is optimistic about finding something in the woods.

5.title: Live to Squatch Another Day
5.plot: Flashing forward to the final night in OK it appears that our team has finally spotted a sasquatch. They use a cherry picker and some music to lure in the beast. Our team of investigators find themselves in very real danger during their final night.

6.title: Bama Bigfoot
6.plot: The team travels to Alabama to investigate Bigfoot reports deep in the pine forests of what residents have dubbed Creepy Mountain. After examining convincing thermal footage, they push further into the forest and break out a search technique designed specifically for a 'Bama Bigfoot.

7.title: Bobo's Backyard
7.plot: The team travels to Bobo's backyard, Humboldt County, to investigate strange photos of a possible bigfoot among the Redwoods. Confident Bobo lives among the bigfoots, the team heads deep into the Redwoods using heavy metal vocals as bait.

8.title: Biggest Search Yet
8.plot: The team from Finding Bigfoot travel to the Four Corners Monument. They split up each taking one of the four states looking for evidence of bigfoots. Will they walk away convinced that the Four Corners is super squatchy?

1.title: Turtleman's Bigfoot
1.plot: The investigators travel once more to the state of Kentucky to inspect some recent casts of bigfoot tracks. After a wild night with Ernie the Turtleman, they have a terrifying night of their own using Louisville Sluggers for knockers.

2.title: Squatching in the Midnight Sun
2.plot: New evidence brings the team back to Alaska, where they decide to divide and conquer. While Matt and Bobo are down in the small village of Bethel, Ranae and Cliff are investigating near Fairbanks.

3.title: Baked Potato Bigfoot
3.plot: The team travels to Idaho in search of their elusive adversary. After sending a scout team of researchers ahead of the group, they split into teams and disperse across the state. They put an elaborate plan in motion to find a Gem State squatch.

4.title: Bobo, Bobcat and the Big Red Eye
4.plot: Compelling evidence brings the team back to the most surprisingly squatchy state, New Jersey. After a night investigation and town hall meeting, Cliff breaks from the team to squatch with his friend, comedian Bobcat Goldthwait.

5.title: Squatchers Take New Jersey
5.plot: Compelling evidence brings the team back to the most surprisingly squatchy state, New Jersey. After a night investigation and town hall meeting, Cliff breaks from the team tosquatch with his friend, comedian Bobcat Goldthwait.

6.title: British Bigfoot
6.plot: The team heads to the United Kingdom to investigate possible sasquatch sightings. Bobo and Cliff head to Scotland where they search for sasquatches near the famed Loch Ness, while Matt and Ranae search for bigfoots in England.

7.title: Matt Goes Home
7.plot: The team travels to Ohio, to investigate the location where Matt had his first face-to-face encounter with a sasquatch.

8.title: Bigfoot Basecamp
8.plot: The team travels to Minnesota following reports of bigfoots making repeat visits to local properties. After establishing a home base, the team sets up surveillance cameras and meets with witnesses.

9.title: Paranormal Squatchtivity
9.plot: The team travels to the eerie woods of Pennsylvania to investigate haunted forests that might be home to both sasquatch and specters.

0.title: Atomic Bigfoot
0.plot: The team is in eastern Tennessee, where they've had success in the past. But they quickly discover the area is shrouded in mystery. Their cumulative research all points to one squatchy spot.

1.title: Amazon Squatchin'
1.plot: The team travels to the Amazon River basin in search of the mythical Mapinguari. With one eye and a gaping mouth on its stomach, the team does not give into the myth, convinced it's yet another undiscovered primate, and set out to find it in the vast jung

2.title: Squatchin' in the Sunshine State
2.plot: The team is in Florida meeting up with local expert Stacy Brown, Jr., in the notorious bigfoot spot, Myakka River State Park. Relying on Stacy's knowledge, the team meet with witnesses with a spooky video of a bigfoot near the Myakka River.

3.title: The Secret Squatch Spot
3.plot: The team heads to the seldom-squatched state of South Carolina to investigate a video of a strange track-way. As more witnesses share their encounters, they split up and hone in on an active area, which leads to an action-packed final night.

4.title: Squatchsploitation
4.plot: The team returns to Louisiana to investigate a bigfoot hot spot, Caddo Lake. After the team reminisces about the 1970s monster films shot at this location, they meet with witnesses and finally head out on an eventful night investigation on the bayou.

5.title: A Squatch in the Ozarks
5.plot: The team delves into the Ozark hollows in search of sasquatch, colloquially known as the Blue Man. A packed town hall verifies that bigfoots have been here for generations and an eventful final night has them convinced the Ozarks are the real deal.

6.title: The Best Little Bigfoot in Texas
6.plot: The team returns to the Lone Star State to investigate new evidence of a bigfoot trackway. Confident a juvenile bigfoot made the tracks, they serve up a true Texas BBQ, fixin' to prove juvenile sasquatches are messing with Texas.

7.title: Bigfoot State of Mind
7.plot: The team traverses the Adirondacks of New York to investigate Whitehall where an area bigfoot expert recounts historic sightings and reveals recent reports. The team enlists the help of local police, hopeful the men in blue can catch a fugitive bigfoot.

1.title: Squatch Wars: US vs Canada
1.plot: The team returns to the Pacific Northwest to settle a bet: which is squatchier, the U.S. or Canada? After they split up to meet witnesses and do night investigations, they try to discover whether the Olympic Peninsula or British Columbia is squatchier.

2.title: Bigfoot's Maine Event
2.plot: The team travels for the first time Maine. They split up to interview eyewitnesses and embark on multiple solo investigations. Matt records multiple bigfoot howls, and is confident they've pinned down a Pine Tree State Sasquatch.

3.title: Grand Bigfoot Hotel
3.plot: The team reports to the Mount Washington resort in New Hampshire where bigfoot sightings have been unnerving hotel guests. Mounting evidence points to Franconia Notch, where the team blasts calls from an alpine horn, hoping to herd in a bigfoot.

4.title: A Few Good Squatchers
4.plot: The team is in Georgia investigating sightings in and around the Ft. Stewart Army base. After meeting with a witness who saw a bigfoot through a thermal imager the team looks for the best place to hold their final night investigation.

5.title: Dronie Loves Squatchie
5.plot: Cliff has brought the team back to his home state of Oregon for the fourth time in search of bigfoots. With a bounty of bigfoot habitat, Cliff enlists professional drone pilots, who may provide the aerial support they need to get a beaver state sasquatch.

6.title: Supernatural Bigfoot
6.plot: The team joins forces with a paranormal investigation group in Mt. Shasta, CA, an area known for its paranormal and Bigfoot activity. Bobo joins the SBC for the week, but will they be able to prove to him, that Bigfoots are supernatural?

7.title: Squatching on Sacred Ground
7.plot: The team receives a special invitation to investigate the Klamath reservation in Southern Oregon, where bigfoot sightings are a regular occurrence. The team investigates a canyon so squatchy, the tribe themselves don't dare to venture in after dark.

8.title: The Booger Hole
8.plot: The team is in Mississippi for the first time to meet with a BFRO investigator, who's investigating bigfoot reports in a new way. As they follow up with eyewitnesses, they become privy to secret spot where they are guaranteed to get bigfoot action.

9.title: Skeptic Showdown
9.plot: The team is in Arkansas, where a group has put up a bounty in exchange for proof of bigfoots' existence. To sway these skeptics, the team invites them along on their expedition, but will they be able to surface the proof needed to cash in on the reward?

10.title: Squatchy Tonk
10.plot: A bigfoot festival brings the team just outside of the music city of Nashville, but it's a bizarre revelation that motivates the team to invite a country star to come squatching with them. She just might be the bait they need to lure in a bigfoot!

imdb.title: Finding Bigfoot
plot: Matt Moneymaker, founder of the Bigfoot Field Researchers Organisation (B.F.R.O.), and a team of the B.F.R.O.'s top investigators travel North America and the world to search for the mysterious creature called Bigfoot.::Jeffrey Kelley
